name: FetchSyncSyncMapPermission
description: Fetch a specific Sync Map Permission.

MapSid.description: Identifier of the Sync Map. Either a SID or a unique name.

Identity.description: Arbitrary string identifier representing a user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Twilio Account.
**identity**: Arbitrary string identifier representing a human user associated with an FPA token, assigned by the developer.
**manage**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can delete the Sync Map.
**map_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Sync Map to which the Permission applies.
**read**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can read the Sync Map and its Items.
**service_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Sync Service Instance.
**url**: Contains an absolute URL for this Sync Map Permission.
**write**: Boolean flag specifying whether the identity can create, update and delete Items of the Sync Map.
